title: Retention time prediction  workflow — fastret.workflow
text: Whole retention time prediction workflow. Function creates predictor set RCDK based SMILES. Trains chosen predcition model validates approach cross validation.

title: Retention time prediction  workflow — fastret.workflow
code: fastret.workflow(   data,   method = "glmnet",   verbose = FALSE,   data_set_name = "data set",   final_model = TRUE,   preprocessed = FALSE,   interaction_terms = FALSE,   nfolds = 2,   include_polynomial = FALSE,   degree_polynomial = 2,   scale = TRUE )
